http://purl.org/dc/terms/abstract.@value:
Linked-Data Ontologie für die Modellierung von Informationen über Objekte und Ereignisse des kulturellen Erbes aus dem Bereich der darstellenden Künste mit Fokus auf nonverbale Formen von Theater. Die Entwicklung der Ontologie is Teil des Digitalisierungsprojekts "NONVERBALES THEATER
                                                          IM EHEMALIGEN OSTTEIL BERLINS 1970-1991" an der Mediathek für Tanz und Theater am deutschen Zentrum des Internationales Theaterinstituts. Das Projekt wird gefördert durch das Förderprogramm Digitalisierung von Objekten des kulturellen Erbes Berlin des Forschungs- und Kompetenzzentrums Digitalisierung Berlin (digiS).

Linked-Data ontology for modelling cultural heritage information in the domain of performing arts focused on non-verbal form of theatre. The ontology development is part of the "NONVERBALES THEATER
                                                          IM EHEMALIGEN OSTTEIL BERLINS 1970-1991" digitisation project at the Media Library for Dance and Theatre of the German Centre of the International Theatre Institute. The project is funded by the Förderprogramm Digitalisierung von Objekten des kulturellen Erbes Berlin of the Forschungs- und Kompetenzzentrum Digitalisierung Berlin (digiS).

http://purl.org/dc/terms/publisher.@value: Media Library for Dance and Theatre / ITI Germany
Mediathek für Tanz und Theater / ITI Deutschland

http://www.w3.org/2004/02/skos/core#defi.@value: This class comprises all agents such as persons or institutions.

http://www.w3.org/2004/02/skos/core#exam.@value: Burkhart Seidemann, Pantomimen-Theater vom Prenzlauer Berg

http://www.w3.org/2004/02/skos/core#defi.@value: This class comprises cities dependent on time and/or geopolitics.
This class comprises (named) resource collections in arbitrary order.
This class comprises countries dependent on time and/or geopolitics.
The digital representation of the contents a medium. Digital information carrier.

http://www.w3.org/2004/02/skos/core#exam.@value: A specific digital file with name IMG-001.tif, VID-001.avi

http://www.w3.org/2004/02/skos/core#defi.@value: This class comprises all events.

http://www.w3.org/2004/02/skos/core#exam.@value: A performance of 'Hamlet', a workshop regarding a specific acting technique, an exhibition about an actor/actress

http://www.w3.org/2004/02/skos/core#scop.@value: Used specifically for events in the realm of performing arts.

http://www.w3.org/2004/02/skos/core#defi.@value: Conceptual representation of the contents a medium captured by a physical or digital (archival) object. The same information object can be captured in multiple pyhsical or digital objects (e.g. a magazine edition). Also one physical object can carry multiple information objects (e.g. multiple movies in a single video tape).

http://www.w3.org/2004/02/skos/core#exam.@value: Aufnahme von Aufführung, Inhalt von Programmheft X

http://www.w3.org/2004/02/skos/core#defi.@value: This class comprises all agents that are organizations
This class comprises all festivals.

http://www.w3.org/2004/02/skos/core#exam.@value: The biannual international theatre festival 'Theater der Welt'

http://www.w3.org/2004/02/skos/core#scop.@value: Used specifically for festivals in the realm of performing arts.

http://www.w3.org/2004/02/skos/core#defi.@value: This class comprises all singular instances or editions of a Festival.

http://www.w3.org/2004/02/skos/core#exam.@value: The 2017 edition of the biannual theatre festival 'Theater der Welt', held in Hamburg, Germany

http://www.w3.org/2004/02/skos/core#scop.@value: Used specifically for festival editions in the realm of performing arts.

http://www.w3.org/2004/02/skos/core#defi.@value: Connects a resource to an agent who contributed to the resource as assistant director.
Connects a resource to an agent who was part of its cast.
Connects a resource to an agent who was responsible for casting.
Describes or connects the relation between a resource and other resources that are members of it (e.g. the members of a artist group).
This class comprises ensembles and similar groups in the realm of performing arts.

http://www.w3.org/2004/02/skos/core#exam.@value: DT Ensemble, Berliner Improvisations Trio, Pantomimen-Theater vom Prenzlauer Berg

http://www.w3.org/2004/02/skos/core#defi.@value: This class comprises locations that were or are used for performing arts.
This class comprises productions that were or are performed in performing arts events.
This class comprises all agents that are persons
Physical representation of the contents a medium. Physical information carrier.

http://www.w3.org/2004/02/skos/core#exam.@value: Videokassette mit Aufnahme von Aufführung, Programmheft X

http://www.w3.org/2004/02/skos/core#defi.@value: This class comprises all places.
This class comprises series.
This class comprises timespans of any length.
Describes the begin date/point in time of a time span.
Connects a resource to another resource it contains an audible reference to.
Connects a resource to another resource it contains an audiovisual reference to.
Connects a resource to another resource it contains any kind of reference to.

http://www.w3.org/2004/02/skos/core#scop.@value: Hier: Referenz kann in der Aufnahme oder als Beschriftung vorkommen, wenn nicht klar, containsreference, wenn klarer, tiefere Ebenen nutzen

http://www.w3.org/2004/02/skos/core#defi.@value: Connects a resource to another resource it contains a textual reference to.
Connects a resource to another resource it contains a visual reference to.
Describes the end date/point in time of a time span.
Connects an event to the place it happened at.
Connects a resource to an agent who contributed to the resource as acrobat.
Connects a resource to an agent who contributed to the resource as actor.
Connects a resource to an agent who contributed to the resource as adaptor.
Describes the address of a resource.
Connects a resource to an agent who contributed to the resource as author.
Connects a resource to an agent who contributed to the resource as choreographer.
Connects a resource to an agent who contributed to the resource as cinematographer.
Connects a resource to an agent who contributed to the resource as clown.
Connects a resource to an agent who contributed to the resource as author.
Connects a resource to an agent who contributed to the resource as concept originator.
Describes or connects to the condition of a resource (e.g. the condition of a physical object or a digital file).
Connects a resource to another resource with matching content. A shorthand property for connecting a resource to another resource with partly or fully matching contents
Connects a resource to an agent who contributed to the resource in any way.
Connects a resource to an agent who contributed to the resource as costume designer.
Connects a resource to an agent who contributed to the resource as creator.
Connects a resource to an agent who contributed to the resource as dancer.
Describes a singular date/point in time.
Describes the date of birth of an agent.
Describes the date of death of an agent.
A general description of a resource.
Connects a physical object with a digital version of itself.
Describes the dimensions of a resource (e.g. the condition of a physical object or a digital file).
Connects a resource to an agent who contributed to the resource as director.
Connects a resource to an agent who contributed to the resource as dramaturge.
Connects a resource to an agent who contributed to the resource as editor.
Describes the extent of a resource.
Describes the family name of an agent.
Describes or points to the first edition of a resource.
Describes or points to the first localized edition of a resource.
Describes the first name of an agent.
A shorthand property for describing the first performance date of a resource (e.g. a performing arts production).
Describes the format of a resource.
Connects to a homepage of an agent.
Describes one or more alternative identifiers of a resource.
Connects a resource to an agent who contributed to the resource as illustrator.
Connects an information object with a physical or digital object it is represented on.
Describes the ISBN of a resource.
Describes the labeling of a resource.
Describes the labeling on the back of a resource.
Describes the labeling on the front of a resource.
Describes the language associated to a resource.
A shorthand property for describing the last performance date of a resource (e.g. a performing arts production).
Connects a resource to an agent who contributed to the resource as layouter.
Connects a resource to an agent who contributed to the resource as light designer.
Connects a resource to an agent who contributed to the resource as make up artist.
Connects a resource to an agent who contributed to the resource as mask designer.
Connects a resource to an agent who contributed to the resource as creator.
Describes or connects to the medium of a resource.
Connects a resource to an agent who contributed to the resource as mime.
Connects a resource to an agent who contributed to the resource as musician.
Describes the name of an agent.
Connects a resource to an agent who contributed to the resource as participant.
Connects a resource to an agent who contributed to the resource as performer.
Connects a resource to a photo studio that contributed to its creation.
Connects a resource to an agent who contributed to the resource as photographer.
Connects a resource to an agent who contributed to the resource as playwright.
Connects or describes two resources in which one resource precedes the other.
Connects a resource to an agent who contributed to the resource as producer.
Connects a resource to an agent who contributed to a festival or event through curating or directing the programme of the event.
Describes or connects to the provenance of a resource.
Describes the publisher of a resource or connects the resource to an agent who contributed to the resource as publisher.
Connects a resource to the place it was published at.
Connects a resource to an agent who contributed to the resource as puppet designer.
Connects a resource to an agent who contributed to the resource as recordist.
Connects a resource to a place it is related to in any way.
Connects to a related website of an agent or a resource.
Connects an agent to its place of residency.
Describes one or more rights statements of a resource.
Describes the rights holder of a resource or connects the resource to an agent who holds rights to the resource.
Describes the season in which a performing arts production was performed.
Connects a resource to an agent who contributed to the resource as set builder.
Connects a resource to an agent who contributed to the resource as set designer.
Connects a resource to an agent who contributed to the resource as singer.
Connects a resource to an agent who contributed to the resource as sound designer.
Describes or connects to the source of a resource.
Connects a resource to an agent who contributed to the resource as speaker.
Describes the subtitle of a resource.
Connects or describes two resources in which one resource succeeds the other.
Connects a resource to an agent who contributed to the resource as author of surtitles.
Connects a resource to an agent who contributed to the resource as translator of surtitles.
Describes the table of contents of a resource.
Connects a resource to an agent who contributed to the resource as technician.
Describes the title of a resource.
Connects a resource to an agent who contributed to the resource as translator.
Describes or connects to the type of a resource.
Connects a resource to an agent responsible for its video design.
Connects a resource to another resource of which it is a part of.
Connects a place to an agent that resides at this place.
Connects an event to the timespan it occured at.
Connects a resource to the location it originated at.
Describes a singular date/point in time at which a resource was created.
Describes a singular date/point in time at which a resource was issued.
